documents.document: @EFoodcentric ah, we saw that was getting good reviews. Will explore. And what do you mean? Where's your emergency hip flask !!
@GeordieMoski @iheartwhisky I'm afraid not- it seems the second batch has already sold out everywhere. I'm assured more is coming soon
@GeordieMoski @iheartwhisky it's a little tricky to find at the moment- demand is high. Online best, but there are a few great bars selling
